column2: UPDATE 1-Amazon to launch video streaming service in Japan Aug 26 Amazon.com said on Wednesday it plans to launch its video streaming service in Japan for members of its Prime paid service as it gears up for Netflix Inc's  planned entry into the country in September.

AIG seeking $1.76 bln in 'life settlements' trial in New YorkAIG seeking $1.76 bln in 'life settlements' trial in New York NEW YORK An American International Group Inc  unit on Thursday asked a federal judge to order a Pennsylvania firm to pay it $1.76 billion in damages for allegedly overcharging for life insurance policies acquired from elderly individuals.  AIG seeking $1.76 bln in 'life settlements' trial in New York NEW YORK An American International Group Inc  unit on Thursday asked a federal judge to order a Pennsylvania firm to pay it $1.76 billion in damages for allegedly overcharging for life insurance policies acquired from elderly individuals. NEW YORK
column3: Aug 26 An American International Group Inc unit on Thursday asked a federal judge to order a Pennsylvania firm to pay it $1.76 billion in damages for allegedly overcharging for life insurance policies acquired from elderly individuals.AIG seeking $1.76 bln in 'life settlements' trial in New York NEW YORK An American International Group Inc  unit on Thursday asked a federal judge to order a Pennsylvania firm to pay it $1.76 billion in damages for allegedly overcharging for life insurance policies acquired from elderly individuals.

column2: UPDATE 3-FDA approves Amgen's cholesterol-lowering drug Repatha WASHINGTON
column3: Aug 27 The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Thursday approved Amgen Inc's Repatha drug for patients with hereditary forms of high cholesterol and those with cardiovascular disease.
